title.rendered: STEM Night Information and Placement Test Registration

content.rendered:
Families who were unable to attend the STEM Night Livestream on 2/13 can view the presentation at the following link: https://youtu.be/qr5bh9NrdWk
 
To register for math and science placement testing, visit https://tinyurl.com/mapletesting no later than Friday, February 16th.
